description: Make this easy chicken salad in four simple steps using only four ingredients. This meal is ready in 15 minutes and perfect for a light yet filling dinner.
name: Easy Chicken & Kaleslaw Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small Granny Smith apple, quartered, cored

recipeInstructions.text: Slice chicken and arrange on kaleslaw mixture. Top with feta and reserved seed mix. Serve with remaining dressing.
